item.title: CVE-2024-4825|2024-05-13T11:23:20.416Z -- Agentejo -- Cockpit CMS
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Agentejo Cockpit CMS v0.5.5 that consists in an arbitrary file upload in ‘/media/api’ parameter via post request. An attacker could upload files to the server, compromising the entire infrastructure.
